improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error. Add a check to ensure x is not zero before performing the division.  This check should prevent the program from crashing during runtime.

Potential performance improvement. The final value of y is always 0 due to the for-loop and final assignment. If y is not used after the loop, the assignment inside loop body (line 10) could be omitted and this line removed completely.

Unreachable code: The code in this if statement (line 8) will never be executed when x = 0. This is because the for loop terminates when x reaches 0, and the condition x > 0 will always be false. Consider removing or adjusting the logic of this if statement based on expected behavior.
